#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include<cassert>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    //cout<<"enter no of test cases:";
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,i,flag=0;
        int ptr;

        //cout<<"enter number of racks or pies\n";
        cin>>n;
        int pie[n];
        int rack[n];

        for(i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>pie[i];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>rack[i];
        
        sort(pie,pie+n);
        sort(rack,rack+n);
        ptr=n-1;
        for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
             if(pie[i]<=rack[ptr]) {flag++; ptr--;}

        }
        cout<<flag<<endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
